title: Best of The Herd for Feb 07, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 07, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and explains why this Rockets experiment of having no size can actually work. He talks about the 76ers chemistry issues. Plus, former NFL WR T. J. Houshmandzadeh says there is a 0% chance that Tom Brady returns to the Patriots and that wherever he goes he wants to bring Antonio Brown along with him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
